TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdateProgressDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具中，提供 控制項的設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別文件。For more information, see the class documentation.

MemberSignature.Value: public UpdateProgressDesigner ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: UpdateProgressDesigner();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立相關聯控制項或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetDesignTimeHtml (System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String
public: override System::String ^ GetDesignTimeHtml(System::Web::UI::Design::DesignerRegionCollection ^ regions);

param.name: regions
param.span: 物件，包含相關聯之控制項的控制項設計工具區域。

span.span: An object that contains control designer regions for the associated control.

summary.span: 傳回 HTML 標記以顯示 控制項，並以目前控制項設計工具區域填入集合中。

span.span: Returns the HTML markup to display the control and populates the collection with the current control designer regions.

returns.span: 相關聯之控制項的設計階段 HTML 標記，其中包括所有控制項設計工具區域。

span.span: The design-time HTML markup for the associated control, which includes all control designer regions.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string GetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion) As String
public: override System::String ^ GetEditableDesignerRegionContent(System::Web::UI::Design::EditableDesignerRegion ^ region);

param.name: region
param.span: 要擷取內容的 物件。

span.span: The object to fetch content for.

summary.span: 傳回 控制項之設計階段檢視的可編輯區域內容。

span.span: Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the control.

returns.span: 在設計階段用來呈現相關聯之 控制項的序列化樣板複本。

span.span: A serialized copy of the template that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion, content As String)
public: override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(System::Web::UI::Design::EditableDesignerRegion ^ region, System::String ^ content);

param.name: region
param.span: 物件，提供要更新的區域名稱。

span.span: An object that provides the name of the region to update.

param.name: content
param.span: 相關聯之控制項的序列化樣板。

span.span: A serialized template for the associated control.

summary.span: 在設計階段指定控制項的可編輯區域內容。

span.span: Specifies the content for the editable region of the control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override bool UsePreviewControl { get; }
.property instance bool UsePreviewControl
Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示設計工具是否應該使用暫存複本 (而非與設計工具關聯的實際控制項) 來產生設計階段標記。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer should use a temporary copy instead of the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
